pattern.name: Switch Off Unneeded Processes
pattern.problem: The energy consumption of a developed software solution is high due to running process instances that unnecessarily are active with repect to the current requirements. (See [1].)
pattern.solution: Adapt the number of active process instances dynamically with respect to the actual requirements at runtime by adding or removing further instances. Generally, such a mechanism has to be considered at an early stage when designing the overall system's architecture.

literature.bibliomixed: Geiger et al. (2020): Ressourceneffiziente Programmierung. Berlin: Bitkom, S. 12.
